Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Kilometer \Kil"o*me`ter\, Kilometre \Kil"o*me`tre\, n. [F. kilometre. See {Kilogram}, and {Meter}.] A measure of length, being a thousand meters. It is equal to 3,280.84 feet, or 0.62137119 of a mile. [1913 Webster]
kilometer n : a metric unit of length equal to 1000 meters (or 0.621371 miles) [syn: {kilometre}, {km}, {klick}]
